creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: solid ring which curves over itself forming a flat piece with lizard/fish incised on it; motif with fire coming out at center; left side insect and bird motifs; right side dragon and lizard/fish motif; six spheres dangle from ring; two center spheres ridged, four side spheres have floral motifs; closure wrapped in thin silver wire
title: Torque
